<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_notif_subscription</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Check duplicate subscriptions</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, _previous /*null when async*/) { var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_notif_subscription'); gr.addQuery("user", current.user); gr.addQuery("notification", current.notification); gr.addQuery("affected_table", current.affected_table) gr.addQuery("affected_record", current.affected_record); gr.query(); if (gr.next()) { current.setAbortAction(true);
if (current.affected_record) { gs.addInfoMessage(gs.getMessage("You have already subscribed to this notification for the affected record")); } else { gs.addInfoMessage(gs.getMessage("You have already subscribed to this notification")); } } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-04-03 20:05:40</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>20ec8af40b911300f4eb8bf637673a7c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Check duplicate subscriptions</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Subscription Based Notifications" source="com.glide.notification">8f83b4243c31311068bcf327dfe37f87</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_20ec8af40b911300f4eb8bf637673a7c</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-10-10 23:01:56</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=20ec8af40b911300f4eb8bf637673a7c"/> </record_update>
